pages.text: $(li)The Refill enchantment can be applied in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/shulker_box)Shulker Box$(/l) and in a $(l:patchouli:perks/backpack)Backpack$(/l).$(br)$(li)Using an item or placing a block will use up the inventory of your Shulker Box instead of your main inventory.
pages.title: Refill

pages.text: $(li)This enchantment can be found Fishing or trading your $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l) with a $(l:patchouli:villagers/librarian)Librarian$(/l).
